sources.title: The Violent Years
sources.description: A newspaper publisher's daughter suffers from neglect by her parents. She and her friends turn to crime by dressing up like men, holding up gas stations, raping young men at gunpoint, and having makeout parties when her parents are away.

sources.title: The Violent Years
sources.description: This film has fallen into the Public Domain.

metadata.Plot: A newspaper publisher's daughter suffers from neglect by her parents. She and her friends turn to crime by dressing up like men, holding up gas stations, raping young men at gunpoint, and having makeout parties when her parents are away. Their "fence" gets them to trash the school on request of sinister un-American clients, and they run afoul of the law, apple pie, and God himself.
metadata.Actors: Jean Moorhead, Barbara Weeks, Art Millan
